title: Ultra-conservative José Antonio Kast elected Chile’s next president | Chile | The Guardian
snippet: Under Kast’s leadership, “we are confident Chile will advance shared priorities to include strengthening public security, ending illegal immigration, and revitalising our commercial relationship,” Rubio said in a statement.

title: Chile elects far-right José Antonio Kast as next president
snippet: Her supporters fear Kast's election marks a return to Chile's far-right past. "Kast's family helped the dictator Augusto Pinochet," Ricardo Herrera said, adding that he lived through Pinochet's dictatorship and it was "brutal".

title: Kast’s Victory in Chile Is Another Win for Global Right-Wing Movement - The New York Times
snippet: Kast, a stern father of nine with ... world by prioritizing strict law and order and sealing borders. He obtained 58 percent of the vote on Sunday. “Chile cannot get used to fear, and Chile cannot get used to fire,” he said ...

title: Conservative José Kast wins Chile presidency with 58% on security platform | Fox News
snippet: José Antonio Kast wins Chile's presidency with 58% of the vote on a hard-right platform promising mass deportations, expanded policing and military deployment against crime.

title: Chile shifts sharply right as José Antonio Kast wins the presidency
snippet: José Antonio Kast, a far-right politician, who has praised Chile's dictatorship, has won the presidency, signaling a sharp rightward shift fueled by fears over crime, migration, and the economy.
